title: Sainsbury's
description:
The data being visualised here is the location of Sainsbury's stores. The height of each pixel represents the distance to the closest Sainsbury's store as the crow flies.

The location of the Sainsbury's stores were scraped from the API that powers the Sainsbury's Store Locator (https://stores.sainsburys.co.uk/). The API was last scraped for updates on 31st May 2021. For more information, the source code that created this dataset is here https://github.com/jamesHargreaves12/DataVis_python.
